text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the MSI GE Series GE63 Raider RGB-052 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GE Series GE63 Raider RGB-052 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Starfield. The build quality of the MSI GE Series GE63 Raider RGB-052 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GE Series GE63 Raider RGB-052 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

The MSI GE Series GE63 Raider RGB-052 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the battery life could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
